summary: SummaryClinique For Men Face Wash is a gentle yet thorough cleanser for normal to dry skin types.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Normal to Dry.Leaves skin feeling fresh, comfortable, never tight or dry.Preps skin for a comfortable shave.Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2271621How To UseLather over damp skin to remove dirt and oil and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual. For great skin, partner daily with Clinique For Men exfoliating tonics and moisturizers.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauramidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Sarcosinate, Tea-Cocoyl Glutamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sucrose, Di-PPG-2 Myreth-10 Adipate, Hexylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria), Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Cetyl Triethylmonium Dimethicone PEG-8 Succinate, Sodium Sulfate, Polyquaternium-7, Laureth-2, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Tocopheryl Acetate, EDTA, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lather over damp skin to remove dirt and oil and soften beard. Rinse well and towel dry. Mornings, shave as usual. For great skin, partner daily with Clinique For Men exfoliating tonics and moisturizers.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I bought this once before
reviews.comments: My husband really liked it so I am going to keep buying it

reviews.headline: Oh heck yeah, brother (Hulk Hogan Voice)
reviews.comments: Too many Men's shower products are the old, harsh 8in1: hair, body, face, carpet, car, dishes and beard or whatever. Just thank god for Clinique and the fact that they recognize that men deserve a variety of quality, effective skincare and hygiene products. Death to the men's 8in1 products

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy again
reviews.comments: Facial Cleanser

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I bought this for my fiancé last year for Christmas and he's been using it every since. It keeps his face clean, clear and fresh the moisturizer pairs extremely well with it. My fiancé loved that he has a skin care regimen now.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again.
reviews.comments: My husband has been using this product for about 2 years. He likes the way it leaves his skin feeling clean and not at all oily.

reviews.headline: I will never use anything else again.
reviews.comments: I was using the charcoal face wash prior to using this one. I loved the charcoal but I always felt as there was a film of soap on my face like I didn't wash it off completely, when I did. I love how this face wash is clear and fragrance free, which is awesome if you have allergies and any heavy fragrance makes you stuffier. You don't need much, I use roughly a dime sized amount. Because of that, you get longer use out of the face wash. It doesn't dry skin out and makes it soft.

reviews.headline: This is a staple for my husband
reviews.comments: He uses it everyday. Keeps his skin clean and smooth. Gentle on his sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: My go to face wash
reviews.comments: I use the product daily along with the exfoliating lotion, the maximum hydration serum and the maximum hydration moisturizer

reviews.headline: Smooth overall complexion
reviews.comments: Purchased this product for my husband. It is a noticeable difference between when he uses it & when he doesn't... his overall complexion is smoother & radiant. I highly recommend it.

reviews.headline: Hubster loves this!
reviews.comments: My husband has never been particular about face wash, but he LOVES this! It deep cleans his face, without over drying or breaking him out! Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Husband loves this stuff!
reviews.comments: We got sample sizes of a few Clinique products a while back and my husband loved this so much he wanted a full size of it. He is 42 and recently realized he needs to take better care of his skin. He's happy with the way this makes his skin look and feel.

reviews.headline: It's really good
reviews.comments: I am going to get it again

reviews.headline: I have been buying this over and over again for my husband.
reviews.comments: My husband has been using this for 3yeard I introduced him since I have been using clinic for over 6 years.

reviews.headline: Amazing face wash very gentle to the skin.
reviews.comments: Great product that does the job. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate my skin and is very gentle. I use this face wash with the moisture surge hydrator and works wonders for my dry skin.

reviews.headline: The Best!
reviews.comments: I use this face wash daily and it works great. I have seen good changes in my skin and shaving after use gives me a smooth clean face and neck. I like this product from Clinique a lot and everything else they offer.

reviews.headline: Hubby loves this
reviews.comments: My husband cant live without this facewash. He loves how gentle it is on his face (he hates my exfoliating washes). He says the $$ is worth it for the product he receives.

reviews.headline: Love it.
reviews.comments: Love it.

reviews.headline: Deep Clem no drying
reviews.comments: Easily washes off.  Skin soft

reviews.headline: I will get this again
reviews.comments: I used this to clear my face. It helps to remove the face oil. It makes my skin feel very clean.

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: I buy this for my husband all the time.  He doesn't use anything else besides this..

faceoff_positive.comments: I was using the charcoal face wash prior to using this one. I loved the charcoal but I always felt as there was a film of soap on my face like I didn't wash it off completely, when I did. I love how this face wash is clear and fragrance free, which is awesome if you have allergies and any heavy fragrance makes you stuffier. You don't need much, I use roughly a dime sized amount. Because of that, you get longer use out of the face wash. It doesn't dry skin out and makes it soft.
faceoff_positive.headline: I will never use anything else again.
